app_name_full.description: Full product name used for the Chrome Web Store listing.

app_name_short.description: Short name shown in the browser action title and UI headers.

app_description.message: Safer send, vim-like scroll, model toggles, temporary chats, and clean UI for ChatGPT.
app_description.description: Extension description displayed in the Chrome Web Store.

html_lang.description: Language code used on the popup HTML tag.

popup_button_reset.description: Label for the reset button in the popup.

popup_loading.description: Helper text shown while storage sync is pending.

popup_footer_review_prompt.message: Even a short comment would truly make me happy
popup_footer_review_prompt.description: Message shown above the footer links encouraging reviews.

popup_feature_label_vim_scroll.description: Toggle label for the vim scroll feature.

popup_feature_label_wide_screen.description: Toggle label for the wide screen feature.

popup_feature_label_safe_send.description: Toggle label for the safe send feature.

popup_feature_label_preserve_scroll_on_s.description: Toggle label for preserving scroll position when sending a message.

popup_helper_shortcuts_empty.message: Enable a feature to customize its shortcuts.
popup_helper_shortcuts_empty.description: Helper text shown when no shortcuts are available.

popup_message_load_failed.message: Failed to load synced settings. Showing defaults instead.
popup_message_load_failed.description: Warning shown when storage retrieval fails.

popup_message_conflict.description: Error shown when the same shortcut is reused.

popup_message_reserved.description: Error shown when the shortcut conflicts with ChatGPT's built-in shortcut.

popup_message_chatgpt_conflict.description: Warning shown when overlapping with a ChatGPT default shortcut.

popup_message_requires_modifier.message: "$1" must be combined with a modifier key.
popup_message_requires_modifier.description: Error shown when a disallowed single key is used.

popup_message_forbidden_key.message: "$1" cannot be used as a shortcut.
popup_message_forbidden_key.description: Error shown when a fully forbidden key is used.

shortcut_panel_extension_heading.description: Heading added to ChatGPT's shortcut panel.

shortcut_panel_settings_label.description: Label for shortcut settings entry in ChatGPT panel.

shortcut_panel_settings_link_text.description: Link text that opens the extension popup.

notification_model_selector_missing.description: Toast shown when the Model selector button cannot be located.

notification_mode_item_missing.description: Toast shown when a specific model menu entry is missing.

notification_temporary_chat_missing.description: Toast shown when the temporary chat button is unavailable.

notification_conversation_menu_missing.description: Toast shown when the conversation menu trigger cannot be located.

notification_pin_menu_item_missing.description: Toast shown when the pin or unpin menu entry is missing.

notification_pin_chat.description: Toast shown after pinning a chat.

notification_unpin_chat.description: Toast shown after unpinning a chat.

notification_branch_chat_not_found.description: Toast shown when trying to branch but no assistant message exists.

notification_copy_last_user_message_miss.message: No user message found to copy
notification_copy_last_user_message_miss.description: Toast shown when no user message copy target exists.

notification_copy_last_user_message_succ.description: Toast shown when copying the last user message succeeds.

error_unknown_mode.description: Fallback error when a mode name is invalid.

error_timeout_generic.description: Timeout error when waiting for an element.

error_timeout_waiting.description: Timeout error that includes the selector.

modifier_label_option.description: Label for the Option/Alt modifier on macOS.
